name: MEOWSBUBBLE3000_喵斯巴卜3000
description:
这是为“益游未尽2022”72小时Jam开发的一款放置类游戏，jam的主题为“治愈”，所以我想到了“猫”和“泡泡”，游戏游玩的过程就是戳破泡泡获得喵喵币，然后再去购买更多的猫猫帮助你戳破泡泡，或者你可以静置这款游戏，让猫猫们帮你干活！

  • 鼠标点击泡泡获得喵喵币
  • 在游戏开始时最好在左上角购买第一只猫猫
  • 点击可以唤醒偷懒的猫猫
  • 用零食喂猫猫让它们变得更得力

--------------------------------------------

This is an idle game developed for the 72-hour Jam of "Yiyou Unfinished 2022". The theme of jam is "healing", so I thought of "cat" and "bubble". The process of playing the game is to burst the bubble Bubble to get meow coins, and then go to buy more cats to help you pop the bubbles, or you can leave the game and let the cats work for you！

  • Click the bubble to get Meow Coins
  •  It is best to buy the first cat cat in the upper left corner at the beginning of the game
  • Click to wake up the lazy cat
  • Feed cats and cats with treats to make them stronger
